sections.title: Noble Scion (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Noble Scion class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Noble Scion)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with all simple and martial weapons, all forms of armor, and shields (excluding tower shields).

sections.title: Affluent ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Noble Scion)
sections.description: Provides a regular stipend of gold pieces equal to 750 × class level at each level gained.

sections.title: Greater Leadership ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Noble Scion)
sections.description: Grants the Leadership feat as a bonus feat at 2nd level, with improved cohort level restrictions (same level cohort at 10th level).

sections.title: Aristocratic Erudition ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Noble Scion)
sections.description: Provides bonuses to Diplomacy, Knowledge (local), and Knowledge (nobility) checks equal to half class level, and reduces DCs for others gathering information about the noble scion.

sections.title: Prestigious Influence ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Noble Scion)
sections.description: Grants a weekly-replenishing pool of virtual gold to spend on services and non-material goods like lodging, transport, spellcasting services, and social favors.

sections.title: Regional Expertise ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Noble Scion)
sections.description: Grants bonus feats from regional lists at 4th, 6th, and 8th levels without meeting prerequisites, based on the noble scion's place of origin.

sections.title: Dilettante Studies (Noble Scion)
sections.description: Allows selection of specialized studies at 5th and 9th levels that enhance abilities from other classes like bardic performance, spellcasting, sneak attack, or combat prowess.

sections.title: Servitor ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Noble Scion)
sections.description: Provides a faithful NPC servitor with levels in NPC classes who runs errands and maintains the noble scion's affairs while adventuring.

sections.title: Peerless Patrician ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Noble Scion)
sections.description: Allows rolling twice per round on social and knowledge checks (taking the better result), and once per day can treat a check as a natural 20.
